title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When creating a working set with one project and selecting it in the package view, the view is filtered accordingly. However, when the working set is immediately removed, unexpected changes occur.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it in the package view. The view is filtered to show only the packages related to the selected project.
EB: When the working set is removed, the package view should return to its original state and show packages from all projects.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it in the package view.
2. Open the working set dialog again.
3. Create a second working set and delete the first one.
